segments.text: Freeze ! Police ! Put your hands over your head !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What did I do ? I haven't done anything .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're under arrest for concealing illegal drugs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are suspected of hiding illegal drugs . So we are taking you into custody .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We've found some heroin at your house .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I didn't . I'm innocent . Those aren't mine . Whatever you found is someone else's stuff . You can't prove anything . I wasn't there when you went in , and you can't prove it's my stuff .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That may be , but you're still under arrest . And you'd better stop talking .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't need your help , jerk .
segments.speaker: S2
